body: You have expanded your natural resistance to magic to encompass different kinds of magic.
name: Expanded Resistance
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Gnomes/New Racial Rules/Gnome Feats/Expanded Resistance

sections.body: Select one school of magic other than illusion. You gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells or effects from the selected school.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: You may select this feat more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time you select it, it applies to a different school of magic.
sections.name: Special
